sn21.1:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
sn21.1:1.3: Tatra kho ayasma mahamoggallano bhikkhu amantesi:
sn21.1:1.5: “Avuso”ti kho te bhikkhu ayasmato mahamoggallanassa paccassosum.
sn21.1:2.2: “idha mayham, avuso, rahogatassa patisallinassa evam cetaso parivitakko udapadi:
sn21.1:2.6: ‘idha bhikkhu vitakkavicaranam vupasama ajjhattam sampasadanam cetaso ekodibhavam avitakkam avicaram samadhijam pitisukham dutiyam jhanam upasampajja viharati.
sn21.1:2.8: So khvaham, avuso, vitakkavicaranam vupasama ajjhattam sampasadanam cetaso ekodibhavam avitakkam avicaram samadhijam pitisukham dutiyam jhanam upasampajja viharim.
sn21.1:2.9: Tassa mayham, avuso, imina viharena viharato vitakkasahagata sannamanasikara samudacaranti.
sn21.1:3.1: Atha kho mam, avuso, bhagava iddhiya upasankamitva etadavoca:
sn21.1:3.2: ‘moggallana moggallana, ma, brahmana, ariyam tunhibhavam pamado, ariye tunhibhave cittam santhapehi, ariye tunhibhave cittam ekodibhavam karohi, ariye tunhibhave cittam samadaha’ti.
sn21.1:3.3: So khvaham, avuso, aparena samayena vitakkavicaranam vupasama ajjhattam sampasadanam cetaso ekodibhavam avitakkam avicaram samadhijam pitisukham dutiyam jhanam upasampajja viharami.
sn21.1:3.4: Yanhi tam, avuso, samma vadamano vadeyya:
sn21.1:3.5: ‘satthara anuggahito savako mahabhinnatam patto’ti, mamam tam samma vadamano vadeyya:
